raw_body: PERERA – KINGSLEY WALTER – Beloved husband of Sunethra,​ precious father of Umesh,​ father-in-law of Olga,​ loving grandfather of Sanshey and Malisha,​ much loved brother of the late Janet,​ late Dottie and Thilaka,​ passed away peacefully on the 1st of November 2023. Remains will lie at “The Respect Home” Borella,​ from 8.30 a.m. on the 2nd of November. Cremation on Friday the 3rd of November at 11.30 a.m. at the General Cemetery,​ Borella.070317
